purpose.body:

  • Web support and maintenance

metadata.description: Bachacode Developers specializes in custom web development, offering static sites, web applications and WordPress, tailored to your needs.

privacy_policy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy_policy.body:
Your privacy is important to us. In this Privacy Policy we explain what personal data we collect from Users and how we use it. We encourage you to read these terms carefully before providing any personal data through this Website or through contact forms.

The use of the Website and the services offered through it is prohibited for persons under 18 years of age without the consent of their parents or legal guardians. If you are under 18 and have accessed this Website without such consent, you must not provide personal data.

On this Website we respect and protect the personal data of Users. As a User you should know that your rights are guaranteed.

We have worked to create a safe and reliable space, and therefore we want to share our privacy principles:
  • We never share personal information of our Users with anyone, except to comply with the law or when we have your express authorization.
  • We never use your personal data for any purpose other than those described in this Privacy Policy.

data_controller.title: Data Controller
data_controller.body: The controller responsible for the processing of personal data is CRISTHIAN JOSÉ FLORES ASTUDILLO (hereinafter, the “Owner”), a resident of Venezuela, who can be contacted at hola@bachacode.com. The Owner offers web development and consulting services through the Website.

purposes_legal_basis.title: Purposes and Legal Bases of Processing
purposes_legal_basis.body:
The personal data collected is used for the following purposes:
  • Responding to inquiries through contact forms (legal basis: legitimate interest).
  • Provision of contracted services such as consultations, project management, or web development (legal basis: performance of a contract).
  • Statistical analysis and improvement of the Website (legal basis: consent through cookies).
    • With respect to User consent to the processing of personal data, the User may withdraw consent at any time by sending an email to the address provided above, without affecting the lawfulness of processing based on consent prior to its withdrawal.

data_types.title: Types of Data Collected
data_types.body:
The following categories of personal data may be collected:
  • Identification data: Name, surname, email address, IP address.
  • Browsing data: Cookies (see our Cookie Policy).

data_retention.title: Data Retention
data_retention.body:
Personal data will be retained under the following conditions:
  • Contact requests and communications: Until the User requests their deletion.
  • Invoices and legal documents: 6 years (to comply with tax obligations under applicable law).

data_recipients.title: Recipients of Data
data_recipients.body:
The personal data provided by Users may be shared with the following entities:
  • The Owner of the Website.
  • External service providers: Hosting services, cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Vercel), email communication tools, and analytical tools (e.g., Google Analytics).
  • Legal obligations: Data may be disclosed to competent authorities if required by law.

user_rights.title: User Rights Regarding Personal Data
user_rights.body:
In accordance with applicable data protection regulations, Users may exercise the following rights:
  • Access, rectification, or deletion of their personal data.
  • Restriction or objection to processing.
  • Data portability.
  • Withdrawal of consent at any time.
  • Right to be forgotten.
    • To exercise these rights, Users may send a request to hola@bachacode.com.

    The maximum response period is 1 month.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.body: This Website uses both first-party and third-party cookies. For more information, please consult our Cookie Policy.

data_security.title: Data Security
data_security.body:
The protection of the privacy and personal data of Users is a priority for the Owner. The Owner takes all reasonable measures to prevent misuse of personal data and restricts access only to authorized personnel.

The Owner maintains appropriate levels of security in accordance with applicable regulations and has implemented technical measures to prevent loss, misuse, alteration, unauthorized access, and theft of the data provided by Users through the Website. However, Users are advised that no security measures on the Internet are completely infallible.

The Owner undertakes to maintain confidentiality and secrecy regarding personal data in accordance with applicable law.

policy_modifications.title: Modifications to the Privacy Policy
policy_modifications.body: The Owner reserves the right to revise this Privacy Policy whenever deemed appropriate, in which case Users will be informed. Nevertheless, we recommend that you check this Privacy Policy regularly in order to review the most recent version.

third_party_links.title: Links to Third-Party Websites
third_party_links.body:
The Website may contain links to websites of third-party companies or entities.

The Owner cannot be held responsible for the way these companies handle privacy and personal data protection. Therefore, we recommend that you carefully read the Privacy Policies of any such websites not owned by the Owner regarding their use, processing, and protection of personal data.

The terms and conditions offered by these third-party websites may differ from those provided by the Owner.

policy_questions.title: Questions About the Privacy Policy
policy_questions.body:
If you have any questions regarding this Privacy Policy or the processing of your personal data, please contact the Owner by email at hola@bachacode.com.

If you believe that your rights have not been properly safeguarded, you have the right to file a complaint with the competent data protection authority in your place of residence.

acceptance_consent.title: Acceptance and Consent
acceptance_consent.body: The User declares that they have been informed of the conditions regarding the protection of personal data, accepting and consenting to the processing of such data by the Owner, in the manner and for the purposes indicated in this Privacy Policy.
